p: Based on previous studies, including the National Lung Screening Trial in the USA (NLST), [ 4] the NELSON study, [ 5] and on the recent recommendations of the Fleischner society, [ 6] the American College of Radiology [ 7] and I-ELCAP action group, [ 8] we developed a protocol for an optimization study in the Czech Republic for the screening of high-risk asymptomatic individuals by low-dose CT (LDCT).
